name: The Silver Fox
description:
BASIC CONTROLS: WASD to move, Left click to throw items from your basket.

Join the heist! Play as the Silver Fox, the once infamous thief- now he's just a retired old man on a scooter trying to rob the art museum after hours. The wife needs some new décor at home, she'll love these!

Your modified mobility scooter has simple and straightforward controls and can throw items inside its basket in a beautiful trajectory, but its movement is hard to master. 

Explore the Straten Museum of Artifacts and Discoveries (SMAD), which is famous for its valuable artwork collections. Snatch as much as you can from the exhibits and toss them into the van for maximum profit.

Be careful though, the museum is filled with security cameras and roaming drones. They will alert the authorities if they see you, causing them to arrive at the museum much quicker.  If the timer runs out, you'll be locked away for larceny!

Post your high score in the comments below!
